titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PERITONEAL DRAIN INSERTED FOLLOWING ABDOMINAL X-RAY INDICATOR - Description

div.p: PERITONEAL DRAIN INSERTED FOLLOWING ABDOMINAL X-RAY INDICATOR is the same as attribute PATIENT PROCEDURE PERFORMED INDICATOR.

For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care,Â PERITONEAL DRAIN INSERTED FOLLOWING ABDOMINAL X-RAY INDICATOR indicates whether a peritoneal drain was inserted following an Abdominal X-Ray, at any time during the neonatal CRITICAL CARE PERIOD.
